text: Chromium(II) oxide is a chemical compound. It contains chromium in its +2 oxidation state. Its chemical formula is CrO. It reacts with oxygen when heated to produce chromium(III) oxide. It is a reducing agent. It is made by reduction of chromium(III) oxide by hypophosphites. ==Related pages== *Chromium(IV) oxide *Chromate *Chromium(VI) oxide Category:Chromium compounds Category:Oxides
title: Chromium(II) oxide
